scripts.build:dev-lib-vue: vue-cli-service build --target app --mode development --formats umd --filename tampermonkey-vue --dest "./build-result/dev-app-entry"
scripts.build:dev-lib-vue-watch: vue-cli-service build --target app --mode development --formats umd --filename tampermonkey-vue --dest "./build-result/dev-app-entry" --watch
scripts.build-production: vue-cli-service build --target app --mode production --formats umd --filename tampermonkey-vue --dest "./build-result/dev-app-entry"
